column2: You can choose a personal patron saint from among the most notable of the Christian faith.
I should dedicate myself to a particular saint and let their virtue inform my rule.
Peter, to whom Jesus gave the keys of heaven.
George, he who slew the dragon.
Choosing any of these as a personal patron saint would be a testament to my piety.
